title: Become your own boss and ditch the 9 to 5 for only $15
content:
Being able to follow your passion, keep what you earn, and set your own hours is a result of living your life as a self-made entrepreneur. If you’ve been itching to ditch the desk job and become a business owner like Steve Jobs or Mark Cuban then you should start by learning to run a low-cost digital product business with the E-Commerce Learning Bundle for only $15!

Taught by CEO and international travel blogger Leon Chaudhari, you’ll pick up all the techniques and business hacks to run your own online company. Write and publish your own bestselling e-book, become the next Bezos with Shopify, and turn your skills into profit with Masterclass. All are businesses with low barriers to entry and the potential to become huge passive income streams. You’ll learn how to start, build, and automate your business, so you’ll get the ultimate freedom of enjoying your life while making money at the same time.

Becoming your own boss can be one of the most freeing experiences of your life. Now you can get started on that journey for only $15 with the E-Commerce Learning Bundle.
